name: Tap'Em All
description:
Tap'Em All is a game inspired by the popular arcade game "Whac-A-Mole", brough to the 21st century. Given the times we are living, you play as an exterminator looking for his revenge against the viruses of the world. Exterminate as many as you can in 60 seconds!

This game was developed for the 2nd semester of my Game Development course as a collaboration of 3 different subjects (curricular units). In it's native form, it includes communication with a database (MySQL) through a server made in JS and a website using HTML and Node JS modules.

Audio is from:

https://soundcloud.com/ashamaluevmusic/sets/happy-music
https://freesound.org/
